text: The wonderful thing about this landscape says Luder during a tour of the sandy coastlinesis that there is no room for sentimental expansions here. Salicius and Nermorus would have been silenced in these meadows and their dead muses of erysipela. How many bad egos our literature would have been rid of! Finished by Luder, 1989
title: Dichos de Luder 42
author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
